titles.title: A bill to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Utah except by express authorization of Congress.
A bill to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in the State of Utah except by express authorization of Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits any further extension or establishment of national monuments in Utah except by express authorization of Congress.
